content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (40.0, -80.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position 40.0, -80.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when setting the recipe for the Stone Furnace
- Ensure that the Stone Furnace is placed correctly and is accessible before attempting to set its recipe. Verify that the entity exists and is the correct type.

### Errors related to furnace inventory and operation
- Check that the Stone Furnace has sufficient ingredients and energy to operate. If it is not working, ensure that coal is inserted and that the furnace is enabled.

### Errors when inserting items into the Stone Furnace
- Make sure to insert the correct items into the Stone Furnace based on the recipe requirements. Verify that the items are available in the inventory before attempting to insert them.

### Errors when lacking resources for crafting
- Ensure that you have enough resources in your inventory before attempting to craft items. Regularly check your inventory to avoid running out of necessary materials.

### Errors when coal is unavailable
- Always monitor your coal inventory and gather coal proactively to ensure the Stone Furnace can operate continuously. If coal is low, prioritize finding coal deposits.

### Errors when inserting items into the Stone Furnace due to lack of coal
- Regularly check your coal inventory and ensure you have enough coal before inserting items into the Stone Furnace. Gather coal as needed to maintain operation.

### Errors when attempting to insert items into a full inventory
- Ensure that the Stone Furnace has available inventory space before attempting to insert items. Regularly check the inventory status to avoid attempting to insert when full.

### Errors when no iron ore is available
- Regularly check your inventory for iron ore and gather more from nearby deposits when low. Ensure you have a sufficient supply before attempting to insert into the Stone Furnace.

### Errors related to furnace status warnings
- Pay attention to the furnace status warnings, such as "no ingredients to smelt." Ensure that the necessary ingredients are available for the Stone Furnace to operate effectively.
